name: Pizza Labyrinth
description:
You are in a pizza and you have to find all the ingredients to make the pizza whole. Get in to the layers of a pizza like labyrinth and find your way out! 

This game is made for Sociaware Game Development Course Jam 2 in 48 hours.

Team:

Yunus Canıtez

Talha Döneray

Beyza Çalık

Berfin Demirpolat

Thank you for playing!
